body: While we have the patient open, can we centralize all occurrences of `static_cast<Variable&>(tensor)` into an inline function `Variable& castToVariableRef(Tensor&)` so that we can add a test that Tensor really is a Variable in DEBUG mode?
body_html: While we have the patient open, can we centralize all occurrences of static_cast<Variable&>(tensor) into an inline function Variable& castToVariableRef(Tensor&) so that we can add a test that Tensor really is a Variable in DEBUG mode?
body_text: While we have the patient open, can we centralize all occurrences of static_cast<Variable&>(tensor) into an inline function Variable& castToVariableRef(Tensor&) so that we can add a test that Tensor really is a Variable in DEBUG mode?
